description.zh-cn: 唐朝第二位皇帝，开创“贞观之治”，被尊为“天可汗”。
description.en: The second emperor of the Tang dynasty, who initiated the 'Reign of Zhenguan' and was honored as the 'Tian Kehan'.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝开国皇帝，唐太宗李世民之父。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Tang dynasty and the father of Emperor Taizong, Li Shimin.

description.zh-cn: 唐高祖李渊的皇后，唐太宗李世民之母。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Gaozu of Tang and mother of Emperor Taizong, Li Shimin.

description.zh-cn: 唐高祖李渊长子，原为皇太子，在玄武门之变中被李世民所杀。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Gaozu of Tang and the original crown prince, killed by Li Shimin during the Xuanwu Gate Incident.

description.zh-cn: 唐高祖李渊四子，与李建成结盟，在玄武门之变中被李世民所杀。
description.en: The fourth son of Emperor Gaozu of Tang, allied with Li Jiancheng, and was killed by Li Shimin's forces during the Xuanwu Gate Incident.

description.zh-cn: 由李世民发动的宫廷政变，通过杀死兄长李建成和四弟李元吉，确立了其皇位继承权。
description.en: A palace coup launched by Li Shimin, securing his succession to the throne by killing his elder brother Li Jiancheng and younger brother Li Yuanji.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民的皇后，以贤德著称。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Taizong of Tang, known for her virtue and wisdom.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗李世民第九子，唐朝第三位皇帝。
description.en: The ninth son of Emperor Taizong, and the third emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗在位期间出现的政治清明、经济复苏、文化繁荣的治世局面。
description.en: A period of political stability, economic recovery, and cultural prosperity during Emperor Taizong's reign.

description.zh-cn: 李渊、李世民父子在晋阳发动的反隋起义，为唐朝的建立奠定了基础。
description.en: An anti-Sui uprising launched by Li Yuan and his son Li Shimin in Jinyang, which laid the foundation for the establishment of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个重要朝代，由李渊建立。
description.en: An important dynasty in Chinese history, founded by Li Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 隋末群雄之一，建立夏国，后在虎牢之战中被李世民击败并俘虏。
description.en: A warlord during the late Sui dynasty who established the state of Xia, later defeated and captured by Li Shimin at the Battle of Hulao.

description.zh-cn: 隋末群雄之一，建立郑国，虎牢之战后投降唐朝。
description.en: A warlord during the late Sui dynasty who established the state of Zheng, surrendered to the Tang after the Battle of Hulao.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝统一战争中的决定性战役，李世民在此一举击败窦建德与王世充两大势力。
description.en: A decisive battle in the Tang unification wars, where Li Shimin defeated the forces of Dou Jiande and Wang Shichong.

description.zh-cn: 位于蒙古高原的游牧汗国，唐朝初年的主要外部威胁，后被唐太宗所灭。
description.en: A nomadic khaganate on the Mongolian Plateau, a major external threat to the early Tang dynasty, later conquered by Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝作为中亚和北亚各民族的国际同盟之主的称号，始于唐太宗。
description.en: A title for the Tang emperor as the head of an international alliance of various peoples in Central and North Asia, starting with Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗时期的著名谏臣和宰相，以直言敢谏著称。
description.en: A renowned chancellor and advisor during Emperor Taizong's reign, famous for his forthright remonstrance.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗时期的主要谋士和宰相，与杜如晦并称“房谋杜断”。
description.en: A key advisor and chancellor to Emperor Taizong, known for his strategic planning.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗时期的主要谋士和宰相，与房玄龄并称“房谋杜断”。
description.en: A key advisor and chancellor to Emperor Taizong, known for his decisive judgment.

description.zh-cn: 高句丽末期军事独裁者，其政变及对外扩张行为引发了唐朝的军事干预。
description.en: A military dictator of late Goguryeo whose coup and expansionist policies led to military intervention by the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛古代王国，与唐朝发生长期战争。
description.en: An ancient kingdom on the Korean Peninsula that engaged in prolonged warfare with the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗嫡长子，原为皇太子，后因与李泰争储并图谋不轨而被废。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Taizong and original crown prince, who was deposed after plotting rebellion due to his rivalry with Li Tai.

description.zh-cn: 唐太宗第四子，深得宠爱，与太子李承干争夺储位，后被贬。
description.en: The fourth son of Emperor Taizong, highly favored by his father, who vied for the crown prince position with Li Chengqian and was later demoted.

description.zh-cn: 吐蕃赞普，统一青藏高原，并与唐朝和亲。
description.en: Emperor of the Tibetan Empire who unified the Tibetan Plateau and established a marriage alliance with the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宗室女，嫁予吐蕃赞普松赞干布，是唐蕃和亲的重要人物。
description.en: A Tang imperial clanswoman who married Tibetan Emperor Songtsen Gampo, a key figure in the Tang-Tibetan marriage alliance.

description.zh-cn: 位于青藏高原的帝国，与唐朝既有战争也有和亲。
description.en: An empire on the Tibetan Plateau that had both conflicts and marriage alliances with the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 李世民是李渊的次子。
description.en: Li Shimin is the second son of Li Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 李世民是太穆皇后窦氏的嫡次子。
description.en: Li Shimin is the second legitimate son of Empress Taimu (née Dou).

description.zh-cn: 李建成是李世民的兄长。
description.en: Li Jiancheng is Li Shimin's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 李元吉是李世民的四弟。
description.en: Li Yuanji is Li Shimin's fourth younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 长孙皇后是李世民的妻子和皇后。
description.en: Empress Zhangsun was Li Shimin's wife and empress.

description.zh-cn: 李治（唐高宗）是李世民的第九子和皇位继承人。
description.en: Li Zhi (Emperor Gaozong) is Li Shimin's ninth son and successor.

description.zh-cn: 李承干是李世民的嫡长子。
description.en: Li Chengqian is Li Shimin's eldest legitimate son.

description.zh-cn: 李泰是李世民的嫡次子。
description.en: Li Tai is Li Shimin's second legitimate son.

description.zh-cn: 因皇位继承问题，李世民与太子李建成发生激烈冲突，最终发动玄武门之变将之杀害。
description.en: Due to the issue of succession, Li Shimin had a fierce conflict with Crown Prince Li Jiancheng, eventually launching the Xuanwu Gate Incident and killing him.

description.zh-cn: 李元吉与李建成结盟对抗李世民，在玄武门之变中一同被杀。
description.en: Li Yuanji allied with Li Jiancheng against Li Shimin and was killed alongside him in the Xuanwu Gate Incident.

description.zh-cn: 李世民策划并领导了玄武门之变，以夺取皇位继承权。
description.en: Li Shimin planned and led the Xuanwu Gate Incident to seize the right of succession.

description.zh-cn: 玄武门之变的成功使李世民被立为太子，并很快继承皇位。
description.en: The success of the Xuanwu Gate Incident led to Li Shimin being appointed as crown prince and soon succeeding to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 李世民积极谋划并劝说其父李渊在晋阳起兵反隋。
description.en: Li Shimin actively planned and persuaded his father Li Yuan to rise against the Sui in Jinyang.

description.zh-cn: 晋阳起兵是唐朝建立的开端。
description.en: The Jinyang Uprising marked the beginning of the establishment of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 李世民通过一系列政治、经济措施，开创了贞观之治。
description.en: Through a series of political and economic measures, Li Shimin created the Reign of Zhenguan.

description.zh-cn: 在虎牢之战中击败并俘虏了窦建德，消灭了其割据势力。
description.en: Defeated and captured Dou Jiande in the Battle of Hulao, eliminating his separatist regime.

description.zh-cn: 在虎牢之战后，迫使王世充投降，消灭了其割据势力。
description.en: After the Battle of Hulao, forced Wang Shichong to surrender, eliminating his separatist regime.

description.zh-cn: 派遣李靖等人率军出征，最终灭亡东突厥汗国。
description.en: Dispatched generals like Li Jing to lead an expedition, ultimately conquering the Eastern Turkic Khaganate.

description.zh-cn: 东突厥灭亡后，被漠北和西域诸国君主尊为“天可汗”。
description.en: After the fall of the Eastern Turkic Khaganate, he was honored as 'Tian Kehan' by the rulers of Mobei and the Western Regions.

description.zh-cn: 因渊盖苏文弑君专权并入侵新罗，李世民发动了对高句丽的战争。
description.en: Due to Yeon Gaesomun's regicide, usurpation of power, and invasion of Silla, Li Shimin launched a war against Goguryeo.

description.zh-cn: 李承干因嫉妒李泰受宠，两人为争夺储位而互相倾轧。
description.en: Li Chengqian became jealous of the favor shown to Li Tai, leading to a fierce rivalry between them for the position of crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 李承干因担心被废，与侯君集等人密谋发动政变，事败后被废为庶人。
description.en: Fearing he would be deposed, Li Chengqian conspired with Hou Junji and others to launch a coup. He was demoted to a commoner after the plot failed.

description.zh-cn: 魏征是唐太宗最重要的辅臣之一，以向皇帝直言进谏而闻名。
description.en: Wei Zheng was one of Emperor Taizong's most important ministers, famous for offering frank advice to the emperor.

description.zh-cn: 房玄龄是唐太宗的主要谋士和长期担任宰相。
description.en: Fang Xuanling was a key advisor to Emperor Taizong and served as chancellor for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 杜如晦是唐太宗的重要谋士和宰相。
description.en: Du Ruhui was an important advisor and chancellor to Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 吐蕃赞普松赞干布迎娶唐朝文成公主，建立唐蕃和亲关系。
description.en: Tibetan Emperor Songtsen Gampo married Princess Wencheng of the Tang dynasty, establishing a marriage alliance.

description.zh-cn: 通过将文成公主嫁给松赞干布，与吐蕃建立了和亲关系，促进了文化交流。
description.en: By marrying Princess Wencheng to Songtsen Gampo, he established a marriage alliance with the Tibetan Empire, promoting cultural exchange.
